name: HAGJ - Mergelgrotten
description:
Important: for improved Visual FX, please download the game (Windows)! Unity WebGL build did not incorporate visual effects properly!

This game is set in Maastricht, The Netherlands during WWII - where existing excavated caves ("Mergelgrotten") where used as an impromptu bomb shelter.

We are Sanne and Tim, and this is our submission for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 2022. We sincerely hope that you enjoy our game!

Massive thanks to the following free assets:
